name.helperText: This is the main name that will appear in search results.

subtitle.helperText: A catchy tagline that appears below your studio name.

description.helperText: Write at least 150 characters for better visibility.

subCategories.label: Subcategories
subCategories.helperText: Select all relevant subcategories for your studio.

genres.label: Genres
genres.helperText: Choose the music genres you specialize in.

address.label: Address
address.helperText: Start typing your address and select from the suggestions.

maxOccupancy.label: Max Occupancy
maxOccupancy.helperText: How many people can comfortably use this space at once?

size.label: Size (m²)
size.helperText: The total area of your studio in square meters.

arrivalInstructions.label: Arrival Instructions
arrivalInstructions.placeholder: e.g. Enter code 1234# at the main gate, take the elevator to the 3rd floor...
arrivalInstructions.helperText: Help visitors find their way to your studio.

sections.basicInfoDesc: Give your studio a clear name and description so users know what to expect.
sections.locationContactDesc: Where can clients find and reach you?
sections.categoriesDesc: Select all relevant categories for your studio.
sections.genresDesc: Select the music styles you specialize in.

itemSections.basicInfoDesc: Give your service a compelling name and description to attract clients.
itemSections.categoriesDesc: Select all relevant categories for your service.
itemSections.genresDesc: Select the music styles that match your service.

instantBook.label: Instant Book
instantBook.description: Allow customers to book instantly without waiting for approval

amenities.title: Amenities
amenities.label: Amenities
amenities.helperText: Select all amenities available at your studio.

equipment.title: Equipment & Gear List
equipment.label: Equipment
equipment.placeholder:
List your gear here (one item per line)...
e.g.
Neumann U87
Apollo Twin X
Focal Alpha 65
equipment.helperText: Being detailed about your gear helps musicians find exactly what they need.

bookingSettings.title: Booking Settings
bookingSettings.subtitle: Control how users book your space and manage your schedule.

requestToBook.title: Request to Book
requestToBook.description: Review every booking request before accepting. Best for studios that need to screen clients.

instantBook.title: Instant Book
instantBook.description: Allow users to book instantly without approval. Gets 2x more bookings on average.

preparationTime.label: Preparation Time (Buffer)
preparationTime.description: Time needed to prepare before the session

minimumBookingDuration.label: Minimum Booking Duration
minimumBookingDuration.description: The minimum time a customer must book

minimumQuantity.label: Minimum Quantity
minimumQuantity.description: Minimum number of units/people per booking

advanceBookingRequired.label: Advance Booking Required
advanceBookingRequired.description: How far in advance customers must book

type.label: Policy Type
type.flexibleDesc: Full refund up to 24 hours before
type.moderateDesc: Full refund up to 5 days before

policies.title: Policies & Rules
policies.subtitle: Set clear expectations for your guests.

flexible.label: Flexible
flexible.description: Full refund up to 24 hours before session start time.

moderate.label: Moderate
moderate.description: Full refund up to 5 days before session. 50% refund up to 24h before.

strict.label: Strict
strict.description: 50% refund up to 7 days before session. No refund within 7 days.

houseRules.label: Studio Rules
houseRules.placeholder: e.g. No smoking inside, No food near the console, Maximum 5 guests...
houseRules.note: Guests must agree to these rules before booking.

price.label: Price
price.helperText: Set a competitive price for your service.

pricing.title: Pricing & Rates
pricing.description: Set your base rates. You can add special discounts later.

platformFee.title: Platform Fee
platformFee.description: StudioZ takes a 10% commission on confirmed bookings. Your payout will be calculated automatically.

dropZone.heading: Click to upload or drag and drop
dropZone.multiple: PNG, JPG or WEBP (max. 9MB per file)

errors.invalidMimeType: Skipped "{{fileName}}" because it is not a valid MIME type.
errors.invalidExtension: Skipped "{{fileName}}" because an invalid file extension was provided.
errors.fileTooLarge: Skipped "{{fileName}}" because it is larger than the maximum 9MB allowed.

paypal.error: Please complete PayPal onboarding process before creating a studio

addOn.title: Add-On
addOn.stepDescription: Offer extra services or equipment to increase revenue.

errors.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
errors.itemIdRequired: Item ID is required to create add-on

comment.label: Special Requests
comment.placeholder: Add any special requests or notes...

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again

errors.itemLimitReached: You have reached the maximum limit of 3 services for free accounts. Please upgrade to a paid plan to create more services.
errors.studioLimitReached: Free accounts are limited to 1 studio. Please upgrade to a paid plan to create more studios.
errors.loginRequired: Please log in to create a studio.

form.itemLimitInfo: You have {{count}} service{{count, plural, one {} other {s}}} remaining on your free plan. Upgrade to create unlimited services.

steps.bookingSettingsDesc: Set booking rules and preparation times
steps.addOnsDesc: Add optional add-ons to your item

form.switchToEnglish: Switch to English to see errors
form.switchToHebrew: Switch to Hebrew to see errors
form.switchLanguageHint: Switch to {{language}} to view and fix errors

proTips.basicInfo: Studios with detailed descriptions in both English and Hebrew get 2x more bookings. Don't forget to switch languages and fill out both!
